verbs.description: Wisconsin [V: should] use money from electronic highway tolling to draw more federal dollars through President Trump 's infrastructure plan , lawmakers said .

[ARG0: Wisconsin] should use money from electronic highway tolling to [V: draw] [ARG1: more federal dollars] [ARG2: through President Trump 's infrastructure plan] , lawmakers said .
[ARG1: Wisconsin should use money from electronic highway tolling to draw more federal dollars through President Trump 's infrastructure plan] , [ARG0: lawmakers] [V: said] .
